sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './PurchaseOrderForm.css'; // Import modular components import Section1CompanyInfo from './components/Section1CompanyInfo'; import Section2PurchaseOrder from './components/Section2PurchaseOrder'; // Import custom hooks import { useDragAndDropSensors, useCompanyFieldsDragEnd, usePurchaseOrderFieldsDragEnd } from './hooks/useDragAndDrop'; // Main Purchase Order Form Component // Main Purchase Order Form Component function PurchaseOrderForm() { // Company fields state for Section 1 const [companyFields, setCompanyFields] = useState([ { id: 'company-name', label: 'Company Name:', placeholder: 'Enter company name' }, { id: 'company-address', label: 'Street Address:', placeholder: 'Enter street address' }, { id: 'company-city-state', label: 'City, ST ZIP:', placeholder: 'City, State ZIP' }, { id: 'company-phone', label: 'Phone:', placeholder: '(555) 123-4567' }, { id: 'company-fax', label: 'Fax:', placeholder: '(555) 123-4567' }, { id: 'company-website', label: 'Website:', placeholder: 'www.example.com' } ]); // Purchase Order fields state for Section 2 const [purchaseOrderFields, setPurchaseOrderFields] = useState([ { id: 'po-title', label: 'Purchase Order', placeholder: '', isTitle: true }, { id: 'po-date', label: 'DATE:', placeholder: 'MM/DD/YYYY' }, { id: 'po-number', label: 'PO #:', placeholder: 'PO#123456' } ]); // Custom hooks for drag and drop functionality const sensors = useDragAndDropSensors(); const handleCompanyDragEnd = useCompanyFieldsDragEnd(setCompanyFields); const handlePurchaseOrderDragEnd = usePurchaseOrderFieldsDragEnd(setPurchaseOrderFields); return (
{/* Page Header */}

); } export default PurchaseOrderForm;
